snippet.title: Tails: The Backbone Preludes - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Raw Fury and developer Eggnut have announced Tails: The Backbone preludes, a pixel-art prequel to the narrative adventure game Backbone. Like Backbone, Tails will star anthropomorphic animals solving puzzles and mysteries in a dystopian Vancouver. It will be released on PC (via Steam) next year.

#IGN #Gaming
